description.@en: Swabbing decks, caulking hulls, repairing sails and piloting boats are tasks I am well acquainted with.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Sailing. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Sailing, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
